mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tests(test_name, test_type, created_by, created_at, topic_id, duration_minutes) VALUES (#{testName}, #{testType}, #{createdBy}, current_timestamp, #{topicId}, #{durationMinutes})
INSERT INTO test_assignments(test_id, student_username, assigned_at) VALUES (#{testId}, #{studentUsername}, #{assignedAt})
INSERT INTO test_questions(test_id, question_id, student_username, order_no, difficulty_id) VALUES (#{testId}, #{questionId}, #{studentUsername}, #{orderNo}, #{difficultyId})
mapper.select: SELECT test_id AS testId, test_name AS testName, test_type AS testType, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt, topic_id AS topicId FROM tests ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT t.test_id AS testId, t.test_name AS testName, t.test_type AS testType, t.created_by AS createdBy, t.created_at AS createdAt, t.topic_id AS topicId, t.duration_minutes AS durationMinutes, tp.topic_name AS topicName, c.course_name AS courseName FROM tests t LEFT JOIN topics tp ON t.topic_id = tp.topic_id LEFT JOIN courses c ON tp.course_id = c.course_id WHERE t.test_id = #{testId}

SELECT test_id AS testId, test_name AS testName, test_type AS testType, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt, topic_id AS topicId FROM tests WHERE test_type = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_question_history (test_id, teacher_id, created_at) VALUES (#{testId}, #{teacherId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select:
SELECT tq.question_id AS questionId,
CASE WHEN tq.source = 'ai' THEN ai.question_content ELSE q.content END AS content,
CASE WHEN tq.source = 'ai' THEN ai.options ->> 'A' ELSE q.option_a END AS optionA,
CASE WHEN tq.source = 'ai' THEN ai.options ->> 'B' ELSE q.option_b END AS optionB,
CASE WHEN tq.source = 'ai' THEN ai.options ->> 'C' ELSE q.option_c END AS optionC,
CASE WHEN tq.source = 'ai' THEN ai.options ->> 'D' ELSE q.option_d END AS optionD,
CASE WHEN tq.source = 'ai' THEN ai.correct_answer ELSE q.correct_option END AS correctOption,
tq.difficulty_id AS difficultyId, COALESCE(q.topic_id, NULL) AS topicId, tq.order_no AS orderNo, tq.source AS source
FROM test_questions tq LEFT JOIN questions q ON tq.source = 'manual' AND tq.question_id = q.question_id LEFT JOIN ai_generated_questions ai ON tq.source = 'ai' AND tq.question_id = ai.id WHERE tq.test_id = #{testId} ORDER BY tq.order_no
SELECT test_name FROM tests WHERE test_id = #{testId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_conversations(test_id, student_username, conversation_id) VALUES(#{testId}, #{studentUsername}, #{conversationId})
